about_the_game:
In "The Bard's Last Song", players take on the roles of three unlikely heroes - Maggie the Mage, Kelly the Knight, and Anwir the Rogue - as they embark on a journey to unite their shattered land. The game begins with Maggie and her father figure, the Bard, on a fateful hike up a mountain. The Bard's sudden death leads to the scattering of his pages across the land, and the trio must recover them in order to restore balance to their world. Each character faces their own unique challenges and enemies as they make their way through twisting forests, dark dungeons, and ruined castles.

Along the way, players will engage in epic battles, solve puzzles, and explore a richly-detailed, hand-drawn world filled with bizarre creatures and hidden secrets. With fast-paced combat, challenging platforming, and a deep, emotionally resonant story, "The Bard's Last Song" is an unforgettable adventure that will keep players hooked until the very end.

short_description: Embark on a thrilling journey with three unlikely heroes in this epic action RPG. Traverse treacherous landscapes, confront formidable foes, and uncover dark secrets as you strive to reunite a fractured kingdom. Band together to save the land from chaos, all in a stylized vector style.
